document.full_text: queen elizabeth ii embarked thursday on the third day of a visit to the irish republic after visiting the site of a massacre more than 90 years ago and speaking of her 'deep sympathy' for past suffering.
document.title: in ireland, queen elizabeth offers 'deep sympathy' for past
lines_and_colors: queen elizabeth ii embarked thursday on the third day of a visit to the irish republic after visiting the site of a massacre more than 90 years ago and speaking of her 'deep sympathy' for past suffering.
